channel.title: Number Theory on My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content in Number Theory on My New Hugo Site

item.title: TokyoWesterns CTF 2018
item.description: This has been an Interesting CTF, we had a lot of fun in solving these question. Revolutional Secure Angou This was a pretty easy question to solve and we were able to do it quickly. This is a ruby script given of how the encryption took place. require 'openssl' e = 65537 while true p = OpenSSL::BN.generate_prime(1024, false) q = OpenSSL::BN.new(e).mod_inverse(p) next unless q.prime? key = OpenSSL::PKey::RSA.new key.set_key(p.to_i * q.to_i, e, nil) File.
